meanings.sent1: I packetised the information before sending it.
meanings.sent2: The system packetised the files for easier transfer.
meanings.sent3: The computer packetised the data like a diligent mail carrier.
meanings.sent4: She packetised her thoughts into manageable chunks.

meanings.definition: Arrange (data) into packets for efficient processing.
meanings.sent1: He packetised the documents to organize them better.
meanings.sent2: The software packetised the images for quick access.
meanings.sent3: The robot packetised the items with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: She packetised her schedule to make the most of her time.
meanings.sent5: Packetising the data improved the workflow efficiency.

meanings.definition: Transmit (data) in packets for faster communication.
meanings.sent1: They packetised the message to send it quickly.
meanings.sent2: The network packetised the information for speedy delivery.
meanings.sent3: The birds packetised their chirps to create a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent4: She packetised her emotions into concise expressions.
meanings.sent5: Packetising the data enhanced the communication speed.
